member.name: T:O3DE.Debug
member.summary: Debug logging utilities for O3DE scripting. Messages are forwarded to the O3DE logging system.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an informational message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.Log(System.Object)
member.summary: Logs an informational message to the O3DE console.
member.param: The object to log (ToString() will be called)

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.Log(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted informational message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogWarning(System.Object)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the O3DE console.
member.param: The object to log (ToString() will be called)

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogWarning(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted warning message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogError(System.Object)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the O3DE console.
member.param: The object to log (ToString() will be called)

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogError(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted error message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs an exception to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.Assert(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that a condition is true. If false, logs an error with the specified message.
member.param: The message to log if the assertion fails

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogWithCaller(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message with caller information for debugging.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogDebug(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message only in debug builds.

member.name: M:O3DE.Debug.LogDebug(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted message only in debug builds.

member.name: T:O3DE.Entity
member.summary: Represents an O3DE Entity in managed code. An entity is a container for components that define its behavior and properties.

member.name: F:O3DE.Entity.InvalidId
member.summary: Invalid entity ID constant

member.name: F:O3DE.Entity.m_id
member.summary: The native entity ID

member.name: F:O3DE.Entity.m_transform
member.summary: Cached transform component (lazily initialized)

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.#ctor(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates a new Entity wrapper for the specified entity ID

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an invalid entity wrapper

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.Id
member.summary: Gets the native entity ID

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.IsValid
member.summary: Gets whether this entity reference is valid (exists in the engine)

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of this entity

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.IsActive
member.summary: Gets whether this entity is currently active

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.Transform
member.summary: Gets the Transform component of this entity. This is cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.Activate
member.summary: Activates this entity (enables all components)

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.Deactivate
member.summary: Deactivates this entity (disables all components)

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.HasComponent(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if this entity has a component of the specified type
member.param: The fully qualified component type name
member.returns: True if the entity has the component

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.HasComponent``1
member.summary: Checks if this entity has a component of type T
member.typeparam: The component type to check for
member.returns: True if the entity has the component

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.FromId(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates an Entity wrapper from a native entity ID
member.returns: An Entity wrapper, or null if the ID is invalid

member.name: P:O3DE.Entity.Null
member.summary: Returns an invalid entity reference

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.op_Implicit(O3DE.Entity)~System.Boolean
member.summary: Implicit conversion from Entity to bool (checks validity)

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.op_Implicit(System.UInt64)~O3DE.Entity
member.summary: Implicit conversion from ulong to Entity

member.name: M:O3DE.Entity.op_Implicit(O3DE.Entity)~System.UInt64
member.summary: Implicit conversion from Entity to ulong

member.name: T:O3DE.InternalCalls
member.summary:
Internal calls to native O3DE C++ functions. These are static function pointer fields that Coral binds to native code at runtime.
DO NOT call these directly - use the wrapper classes (Debug, Entity, Transform, etc.)

member.name: T:O3DE.RaycastHit
member.summary: Raycast hit result structure. Must match the layout of InteropRaycastHit in C++.

member.name: F:O3DE.RaycastHit.Hit
member.summary: Whether the raycast hit anything

member.name: F:O3DE.RaycastHit.Point
member.summary: The point where the ray hit

member.name: F:O3DE.RaycastHit.Normal
member.summary: The normal of the surface at the hit point

member.name: F:O3DE.RaycastHit.Distance
member.summary: The distance from the ray origin to the hit point

member.name: F:O3DE.RaycastHit.EntityId
member.summary: The entity ID of the object that was hit

member.name: M:O3DE.RaycastHit.GetEntity
member.summary: Get the entity that was hit

member.name: T:O3DE.Quaternion
member.summary: A quaternion representing a rotation. Layout matches O3DESharp::InteropQuaternion in C++ for seamless interop.

member.name: F:O3DE.Quaternion.X
member.summary: X component of the quaternion

member.name: F:O3DE.Quaternion.Y
member.summary: Y component of the quaternion

member.name: F:O3DE.Quaternion.Z
member.summary: Z component of the quaternion

member.name: F:O3DE.Quaternion.W
member.summary: W component of the quaternion (scalar part)

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.Identity
member.summary: Returns the identity quaternion (no rotation)

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Create a new Quaternion with the specified components

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.Magnitude
member.summary: Returns the length (magnitude) of this quaternion

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.SqrMagnitude
member.summary: Returns the squared length of this quaternion (faster than Magnitude)

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.Normalized
member.summary: Returns this quaternion with a magnitude of 1

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.Conjugate
member.summary: Returns the conjugate of this quaternion

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.Inverse
member.summary: Returns the inverse of this quaternion

member.name: P:O3DE.Quaternion.EulerAngles
member.summary: Returns the euler angles (in degrees) representing this rotation

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Normalize
member.summary: Normalizes this quaternion in place

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Set(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Set all components of this quaternion

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.FromEuler(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a quaternion from euler angles (in degrees)

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.FromEuler(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a quaternion from euler angles (in degrees)

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.AngleAxis(System.Single,O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a quaternion representing a rotation around an axis
member.param: The axis to rotate around (should be normalized)

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.FromToRotation(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a quaternion that rotates from one direction to another

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.LookRotation(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a rotation that looks in the specified direction

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.LookRotation(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates a rotation that looks in the specified direction with up as Vector3.Up

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Dot(O3DE.Quaternion,O3DE.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the dot product of two quaternions

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Angle(O3DE.Quaternion,O3DE.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the angle in degrees between two rotations

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Slerp(O3DE.Quaternion,O3DE.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Spherically interpolates between two quaternions

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.SlerpUnclamped(O3DE.Quaternion,O3DE.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Spherically interpolates between two quaternions without clamping t

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.Lerp(O3DE.Quaternion,O3DE.Quaternion,System.Single)
member.summary: Linearly interpolates between two quaternions (not recommended, use Slerp)

member.name: M:O3DE.Quaternion.RotatePoint(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Rotates a point by this quaternion

member.name: T:O3DE.Vector3
member.summary: A 3D vector with float components. Layout matches O3DESharp::InteropVector3 in C++ for seamless interop.

member.summary: X component of the vector

member.name: F:O3DE.Vector3.Y
member.summary: Y component of the vector

member.name: F:O3DE.Vector3.Z
member.summary: Z component of the vector

member.name: P:O3DE.Vector3.Back
member.summary: Returns Vector3(0, -1, 0)

member.name: P:O3DE.Vector3.Up
member.summary: Returns Vector3(0, 0, 1) - Up in O3DE coordinate system

member.name: P:O3DE.Vector3.Down
member.summary: Returns Vector3(0, 0, -1)

member.summary: Returns the squared length of this vector (faster than Magnitude)

member.summary: Returns this vector with a magnitude of 1

member.summary: Normalizes this vector in place

member.name: T:O3DE.Physics
member.summary: Provides access to physics-related functionality in O3DE. This class wraps the PhysX physics system queries.

member.name: F:O3DE.Physics.DefaultMaxDistance
member.summary: Default maximum distance for raycasts

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.Raycast(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray from origin in the specified direction and returns information about what was hit.
member.param: The starting point of the ray in world space
The direction of the ray (will be normalized)
The maximum distance the ray should travel
member.returns: A RaycastHit containing information about what was hit, or a hit with Hit=false if nothing was hit

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.RaycastCheck(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray from origin in the specified direction and returns whether anything was hit.
member.param: The starting point of the ray in world space
The direction of the ray (will be normalized)
The maximum distance the ray should travel
member.returns: True if the ray hit something, false otherwise

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.Raycast(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.RaycastHit@,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray from origin in the specified direction and outputs the hit information.
member.param: The starting point of the ray in world space
The direction of the ray (will be normalized)
The maximum distance the ray should travel
member.returns: True if the ray hit something, false otherwise

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.Linecast(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Casts a ray from one point to another and returns whether anything was hit. Useful for line-of-sight checks.
member.param: The starting point of the ray
The end point of the ray
member.returns: True if something is blocking the path, false if the path is clear

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.Linecast(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.RaycastHit@)
member.summary: Casts a ray from one point to another and outputs the hit information.
member.param: The starting point of the ray
The end point of the ray
member.returns: True if something was hit, false otherwise

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.GroundCheck(O3DE.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray downward from the specified position to find the ground.
member.param: Maximum distance to check for ground
member.returns: The hit result, or a miss if no ground was found

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.GetGroundHeight(O3DE.Vector3,System.Single@,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray downward from the specified position to find the ground height.
member.param: Output parameter for the ground height (Y coordinate)
Maximum distance to check for ground
member.returns: True if ground was found, false otherwise

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.HasLineOfSight(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Checks if there is a clear line of sight between two points.
member.returns: True if there is a clear line of sight, false if something is blocking

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.HasLineOfSight(O3DE.Entity,O3DE.Entity)
member.summary: Checks if there is a clear line of sight between two entities.
member.returns: True if there is a clear line of sight, false if something is blocking

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.RaycastForward(O3DE.Entity,System.Single)
member.summary: Casts a ray from an entity in its forward direction.
member.returns: The raycast hit result

member.name: M:O3DE.Physics.DistanceToNearest(O3DE.Vector3,O3DE.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the distance to the nearest object in the specified direction.
member.returns: The distance to the nearest object, or maxDistance if nothing was hit

member.name: T:O3DE.Reflection.ReflectionInternalCalls
member.summary: Internal calls for the reflection system. These map directly to C++ functions in GenericDispatcher. Coral populates these function pointer fields at runtime via AddInternalCall().

member.name: T:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection
member.summary:
Provides access to O3DE's BehaviorContext reflection system from C#.
This allows C# code to: - Query available classes, methods, and properties - Create instances of reflected types - Invoke methods and access properties dynamically - Broadcast and send EBus events
This is the "Option B" automated reflection approach where any type reflected to BehaviorContext becomes accessible from C# automatically.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetClassNames
member.summary: Get all class names reflected to BehaviorContext. Results are cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetMethodNames(System.String)
member.summary: Get all method names for a reflected class. Results are cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetPropertyNames(System.String)
member.summary: Get all property names for a reflected class. Results are cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetEBusNames
member.summary: Get all EBus names reflected to BehaviorContext. Results are cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetEBusEventNames(System.String)
member.summary: Get all event names for a reflected EBus. Results are cached for performance.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.ClassExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if a class is reflected to BehaviorContext.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.MethodExists(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if a method exists on a reflected class.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.ClearCache
member.summary: Clear all cached reflection data. Call this after hot-reload to refresh the cache.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.InvokeStaticMethod(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke a static method on a reflected class.
member.param: Arguments to pass to the method
member.returns: The result as a dynamic object, or null for void methods

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.InvokeInstanceMethod(O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke an instance method on a native object.
member.param: Arguments to pass to the method
member.returns: The result as a dynamic object, or null for void methods

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.InvokeGlobalMethod(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke a global method (not part of any class).
member.param: Arguments to pass to the method
member.returns: The result as a dynamic object, or null for void methods

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetProperty``1(O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject,System.String)
member.summary: Get a property value from a native object.
member.typeparam: The expected type of the property
member.returns: The property value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.SetProperty(O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Set a property value on a native object.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.GetGlobalProperty``1(System.String)
member.summary: Get a global property value.
member.typeparam: The expected type of the property
member.returns: The property value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.SetGlobalProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Set a global property value.

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.BroadcastEBusEvent(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Broadcast an event on an EBus (sends to all handlers).
member.returns: The result if the event has a return value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.SendEBusEvent(System.String,System.String,System.UInt64,System.Object[])
member.summary: Send an event to a specific address on an EBus.
member.param: The entity ID to send to
member.returns: The result if the event has a return value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.SendEBusEvent(System.String,System.String,O3DE.Entity,System.Object[])
member.summary: Send an event to a specific entity on an EBus.
member.returns: The result if the event has a return value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.CreateInstance(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Create an instance of a reflected native class.
member.returns: A NativeObject wrapper for the created instance

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeReflection.DestroyInstance(O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject)
member.summary: Destroy a native object instance.

member.name: T:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject
member.summary: Represents a native O3DE object created through reflection. This is a wrapper around a native pointer that allows method invocation and property access through the reflection system.

member.name: P:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.Handle
member.summary: The native handle (pointer) to the object

member.name: P:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.TypeName
member.summary: The type name of the native class

member.name: P:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.IsValid
member.summary: Whether this object reference is valid

member.name: P:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.IsDisposed
member.summary: Whether this object has been disposed

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Create a new NativeObject wrapper

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.InvokeMethod(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke a method on this object
member.returns: The return value, or null for void methods

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.InvokeMethod``1(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invoke a method with a typed return value
member.returns: The return value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.GetProperty``1(System.String)
member.summary: Get a property value
member.returns: The property value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.SetProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Set a property value

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.Invalidate
member.summary: Mark this object as invalid (called after destruction)

member.name: M:O3DE.Reflection.NativeObject.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose of the native object

member.name: T:O3DE.ScriptComponent
F:O3DE.ScriptComponent.m_entityId
member.summary: The native entity ID. This field is set by the C++ CSharpScriptComponent. DO NOT modify this field manually.

member.name: F:O3DE.ScriptComponent.m_entity
member.summary: Cached Entity wrapper (lazily initialized)

member.name: F:O3DE.ScriptComponent.m_transform
member.summary: Cached Transform wrapper (lazily initialized)

member.name: P:O3DE.ScriptComponent.Entity
member.summary: Gets the Entity this script is attached to.

member.name: P:O3DE.ScriptComponent.Transform
member.summary: Gets the Transform of the entity this script is attached to. This is a shortcut for Entity.Transform.

member.name: P:O3DE.ScriptComponent.EntityId
member.summary: Gets the native entity ID.

member.name: P:O3DE.ScriptComponent.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the entity this script is attached to.

member.name: P:O3DE.ScriptComponent.IsActive
member.summary: Gets whether the entity is currently active.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnCreate
member.summary: Called when the script component is first activated. Use this for initialization logic.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnUpdate(System.Single)
member.summary: Called every frame while the component is active.
member.param: The time in seconds since the last frame

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnDestroy
member.summary: Called when the script component is deactivated. Use this for cleanup logic.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnTransformChanged
member.summary: Called when the entity's transform changes (position, rotation, or scale). Override this to react to transform changes.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnEnable
member.summary: Called when the component is enabled (after being disabled).

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.OnDisable
member.summary: Called when the component is disabled.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an informational message to the O3DE console. Shortcut for Debug.Log().

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.Log(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Logs a formatted informational message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.LogWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a warning message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.LogError(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the O3DE console.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.HasComponent(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the entity has a component of the specified type.
member.param: The fully qualified component type name
member.returns: True if the entity has the component

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.ActivateEntity
member.summary: Activates the entity this script is attached to.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.DeactivateEntity
member.summary: Deactivates the entity this script is attached to.

member.name: M:O3DE.ScriptComponent.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this script component.

member.name: T:O3DE.Time
member.summary: Provides access to time-related functionality in O3DE. All time values are in seconds unless otherwise specified.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.DeltaTime
member.summary: Gets the time in seconds since the last frame (delta time). Use this to make movement and other updates frame-rate independent.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.TotalTime
member.summary: Gets the total time in seconds since the application started.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.TimeScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the time scale (simulation speed multiplier). A value of 1.0 is normal speed, 0.5 is half speed, 2.0 is double speed. Setting this to 0 effectively pauses the simulation.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.FrameCount
member.summary: Gets the current frame count since the application started.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.ScaledDeltaTime
member.summary: Gets the scaled delta time (DeltaTime * TimeScale). This is useful for time-scaled gameplay logic.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.UnscaledDeltaTime
member.summary: Gets the unscaled delta time (not affected by TimeScale). Use this for UI and other elements that shouldn't be affected by time scale.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.FPS
member.summary: Gets the frames per second based on the current delta time.

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the simulation by setting TimeScale to 0.

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.Resume
member.summary: Resumes the simulation by setting TimeScale to 1.

member.name: P:O3DE.Time.IsPaused
member.summary: Checks if the simulation is paused (TimeScale is 0).

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.SmoothDamp(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Smoothly interpolates a value over time (useful for frame-rate independent lerping).
member.param: The approximate time it takes to reach the target
member.returns: The smoothed value

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.PingPong(System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a value that oscillates between 0 and 1 over time using a sine wave.
member.param: The frequency of oscillation (cycles per second)
member.returns: A value between 0 and 1

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.PingPong(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Returns a value that oscillates between min and max over time.
member.param: The frequency of oscillation (cycles per second)
member.returns: A value between min and max

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.HasElapsed(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Checks if a certain amount of time has passed since a given start time.
member.returns: True if the duration has passed

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.ElapsedSince(System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the elapsed time since a given start time.
member.returns: The elapsed time in seconds

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.RemainingTime(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the remaining time until a deadline.
member.returns: The remaining time in seconds (0 if past deadline)

member.name: M:O3DE.Time.Progress(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the progress (0 to 1) of a duration since a start time.
member.returns: A value from 0 (start) to 1 (complete)

member.name: T:O3DE.Transform
member.summary:
Provides access to an entity's transform (position, rotation, scale). This class wraps the native TransformBus functionality.
O3DE uses a right-handed coordinate system: - X is Right - Y is Forward - Z is Up

member.name: F:O3DE.Transform.m_entity
member.summary: The entity this transform belongs to

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.#ctor(O3DE.Entity)
member.summary: Creates a new Transform wrapper for the specified entity

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.#ctor(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates a new Transform wrapper for the specified entity ID

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Entity
member.summary: Gets the entity this transform belongs to

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.IsValid
member.summary: Gets whether this transform is valid (entity exists)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the world position of this entity

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.LocalPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the local position of this entity (relative to parent)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the world rotation of this entity as a quaternion

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.EulerAngles
member.summary: Gets or sets the world rotation of this entity as euler angles (in degrees)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.LocalScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the local scale of this entity

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.UniformScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform local scale of this entity

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Forward
member.summary: Gets the forward direction of this entity (Y-axis in O3DE)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Right
member.summary: Gets the right direction of this entity (X-axis in O3DE)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Up
member.summary: Gets the up direction of this entity (Z-axis in O3DE)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Back
member.summary: Gets the backward direction of this entity (negative Y-axis)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Left
member.summary: Gets the left direction of this entity (negative X-axis)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Down
member.summary: Gets the down direction of this entity (negative Z-axis)

member.name: P:O3DE.Transform.Parent
member.summary: Gets the parent entity of this entity, or null if no parent

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.SetParent(O3DE.Entity)
member.summary: Sets the parent of this entity
member.param: The new parent entity, or null to unparent

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.ClearParent
member.summary: Removes this entity's parent (makes it a root entity)

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.Translate(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Moves the entity by the specified offset in world space

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.TranslateLocal(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Moves the entity by the specified offset in local space
member.param: The offset to apply in local coordinates

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.Rotate(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Rotates the entity by the specified euler angles (in degrees)

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.RotateAround(O3DE.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates the entity around an axis by the specified angle

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.LookAt(O3DE.Vector3,System.Nullable{O3DE.Vector3})
member.summary: Rotates the entity to look at a target position

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.LookAt(O3DE.Entity,System.Nullable{O3DE.Vector3})
member.summary: Rotates the entity to look at another entity

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.TransformPoint(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Transforms a point from local space to world space
member.returns: The point in world space

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.InverseTransformPoint(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Transforms a point from world space to local space
member.returns: The point in local space

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.TransformDirection(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Transforms a direction from local space to world space (ignores position and scale)
member.returns: The direction in world space

member.name: M:O3DE.Transform.InverseTransformDirection(O3DE.Vector3)
member.summary: Transforms a direction from world space to local space (ignores position and scale)
member.returns: The direction in local space
